name: Iode Demo
description:
This is the demo of an upcoming game. I would really like any support from you in your possibilities, it can be comments and feedback or even donations. Thank you very much!

Iode is the remake of a game I've already started, but couldn't finish it. It's way better than its first version, so test it! It's still in demo because I want to know if I am on the good way. So don't hesitate to give feedback and suggest ways to improve it!

Controls: Use the arrow keys to move and any key to continue in a dialog.

Join me on Discord! https://discord.gg/hhsh4Xq
